definition: a truck equipped to hoist and pull wrecked cars (or to remove cars from no-parking zones)
details:
noun
- a truck equipped to hoist and pull wrecked cars (or to remove cars from no-parking zones)
= synonyms: tow truck
- someone who commits sabotage or deliberately causes wrecks
= synonyms: saboteur, diversionist
- someone who demolishes or dismantles buildings as a job
